menu.name: STIX
menu.describe: Crunchy meat on a stick rolled in cheese, potato, ramen, or panko, and is drizzled in spicy mayo.

menu.name: Ol' Glizzy
menu.describe: Tastes ok. A real soldier of a hot dog. Probably the best dog/price ratio we'll ever have.

menu.name: The Progress
menu.describe: Double-smoked pork hot dog with bonito-rosemary aioli, kimchi, and toasted sesame on a grilled milk bun.

menu.name: Willkommen
menu.describe: A tasteful combination of a organic meat and perfectly sour German sauerkraut.

menu.name: 4505 HOT DOG
menu.describe: Bacon studded dog on a bun, served with small slaw.

menu.name: DittyDog
menu.describe: Beef hot dog, overloaded with spreads and toppings, from cream cheese (yes) to caramelized onions.

menu.name: Domo Alley-Gato Tatsu-Ya
menu.describe: Japanese take on hot dog is wrapped in a panko brioche filled with curry chili, cabbage and honey aioli.

menu.name: New York Burger Co.
menu.describe: Exactly 12 inches of weenie, succulent and salty and every bit as good as the best examples of regular dogs in town.
